contest-event.event-date: Nov. 1, 1975 D National Mineworkers (Second Section) National Mineworkers (Second Section) 20 Test Piece Contest National Mineworkers Contest national-mineworkers-second-section This contest became the Butlins Mineworkers Contest in 2003. Second The Force of Destiny (La Forza del Destino) - Overture [arr. F. Wright] Winter Gardens (Empress Ballroom), Blackpool, Lancashire, England, UK 11 bands competed. 14th annual contest. May 16, 2013, 12:21 p.m. June 14, 2020, 11:20 a.m. 1 Goldthorpe Band Jackie Argyle 2 Blidworth Welfare Band Stephen Shimwell 3 Bestwood Welfare Black Diamonds Band Bernard Wilson 4 Ystalyfera Public Lewis Williams Unknown Result Dearham Band Joe Ireland Unknown Result Blaina & District I.
